item.title: Dynamic method in ruby
item.description: In Ruby, the dynamic nature of method dispatch is one of its key features.

item.title: Origins of Graphql
item.description: Königsberg Bridge Problem — The Big Bang of GraphQL “Starting from any of the four land areas A, B, C, D is it possible to cross each of the seven bridges exactly once and come back to the starting point without swimming across the river?
